result_list.explanation: Ici Phalante paraît. - This stage direction indicates that Phalante enters the stage, so it fits the 'entrance' category.
Les choristes se retirent. - This stage direction indicates that the chorists exit the stage, so it fits the 'exit' category.
Il s'assoit près de Philippe. - This stage direction indicates a character's movement to sit near Philippe, so it fits the 'movement' category.
François va vers la fenêtre. - This stage direction indicates a character's movement towards the window, so it fits the 'movement' category.
Il se fait un grand bruit sous le théâtre. - This stage direction narrates a noise that occurs, so it fits the 'narration' category.
